;;;90     			cmenu->index[0] = dfnum +'1';
000292  f1050031          ADD      r0,r5,#0x31
000296  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;91     			if(cmenu->index[0]>'9')

00029a  2839              CMP      r0,#0x39
00029c  dd05              BLE      |L1.682|
;;;92     			{
;;;93     				cmenu->index[0] = 'A'+ j;

0002a2  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;94     				j++;
0002a4  3840              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x40
0002a6  f00008ff          AND      r8,r0,#0xff
                  |L1.682|
;;;95     			}
;;;96     			if(i == 0)//此页最后一项
0002aa  bbe7              CBNZ     r7,|L1.806|
;;;97     			{		
;;;98     				/*
;;;99     				高亮显示
;;;100    				*/
;;;101    				//显示下标
;;;102    				//显示菜单第一项
;;;103    				lcd_show_string(cmenu->index, cmenu->itemlist[k].item->x, cmenu->itemlist[k].item->y, cmenu->forceground, cmenu->background ,*(cmenu->itemlist[k].item->font));
0002ac  68e0              LDR      r0,[r4,#0xc]
0002ae  f8500036          LDR      r0,[r0,r6,LSL #3]
0002b2  68c2              LDR      r2,[r0,#0xc]

0002d6  68e0              LDR      r0,[r4,#0xc]
0002d8  f8500036          LDR      r0,[r0,r6,LSL #3]

                  |L1.972|

0003ce  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
;;;112    			k --;

0003d2  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0

0003d6  b2c7              UXTB     r7,r0                 ;88

0003dc  f73faf59          BGT      |L1.658|

0003e4  7420              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x10]
;;;115    	}
0003e6  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.1000|
;;;116    } 
0003e8  e8bd87ff          POP      {r0-r10,pc}
;;;117    
                          ENDP

                  MenuNAVUP PROC
;;;120    */
;;;121    void MenuNAVUP(menu* cmenu)
0003ec  e92d47ff          PUSH     {r0-r10,lr}
;;;122    {
0003f0  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;123    	uint8_t dfnum;
;;;124    	if(cmenu->selectitem <= cmenu->sizePer && cmenu->selectitem <= cmenu->height && cmenu->selectitem != 1)//不是最上面，不需要滚动

0003f4  7921              LDRB     r1,[r4,#4]
0003f6  4288              CMP      r0,r1
                  |L1.1016|
0003f8  dc7e              BGT      |L1.1272|
0003fa  7c20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0x10]
0003fc  78e1              LDRB     r1,[r4,#3]
0003fe  4288              CMP      r0,r1
000400  dcfa              BGT      |L1.1016|
000402  7c20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0x10]
000404  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000406  d077              BEQ      |L1.1272|
;;;125    	{
;;;126    		dfnum = cmenu->selectitem;

;;;127

00040e  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;129    		if(cmenu->index[0] > '9')

                  |L1.1052|

;;;163

                  |L1.1380|

;;;173    			*/

;;;175    			{
;;;176

00056a  68e1              LDR      r1,[r4,#0xc]
00056c  f8510030          LDR      r0,[r1,r0,LSL #3]
000570  68c2              LDR      r2,[r0,#0xc]
000572  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
000574  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
000576  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
000578  8aa0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x14]
00057a  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00057c  1e70              SUBS     r0,r6,#1
00057e  f8d4c00c          LDR      r12,[r4,#0xc]
000582  f85c0030          LDR      r0,[r12,r0,LSL #3]
000586  88c2              LDRH     r2,[r0,#6]
000588  1e70              SUBS     r0,r6,#1
00058a  f85c0030          LDR      r0,[r12,r0,LSL #3]
00058e  8881              LDRH     r1,[r0,#4]
000590  8a63              LDRH     r3,[r4,#0x12]
000592  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000594  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
;;;178    				lcd_show_string(cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->character, cmenu->itemlist[i -1].item->x + cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->font->size, cmenu->itemlist[i -1].item->y, cmenu->forceground, cmenu->background, *(cmenu->itemlist[i - 1].item->font));
000598  1e70              SUBS     r0,r6,#1
00059a  68e1              LDR      r1,[r4,#0xc]
00059c  f8510030          LDR      r0,[r1,r0,LSL #3]
0005a0  68c2              LDR      r2,[r0,#0xc]
0005a2  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
0005a4  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
0005a6  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
0005a8  8aa0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x14]
0005aa  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0005ac  f1a60c01          SUB      r12,r6,#1
0005b0  f8d4800c          LDR      r8,[r4,#0xc]
0005b4  f858c03c          LDR      r12,[r8,r12,LSL #3]
0005b8  f8bc8004          LDRH     r8,[r12,#4]
0005bc  f1a50c01          SUB      r12,r5,#1
0005c0  f8d4900c          LDR      r9,[r4,#0xc]
0005c4  f859c03c          LDR      r12,[r9,r12,LSL #3]
0005c8  f8dcc00c          LDR      r12,[r12,#0xc]
0005cc  f89cc000          LDRB     r12,[r12,#0]
0005d0  44c4              ADD      r12,r12,r8
0005d2  fa1ff18c          UXTH     r1,r12
0005d6  f1a60c01          SUB      r12,r6,#1
0005da  f859c03c          LDR      r12,[r9,r12,LSL #3]
0005de  f8bc2006          LDRH     r2,[r12,#6]
0005e2  f1a50c01          SUB      r12,r5,#1
0005e6  f859c03c          LDR      r12,[r9,r12,LSL #3]
0005ea  8a63              LDRH     r3,[r4,#0x12]
0005ec  f8dc0000          LDR      r0,[r12,#0]
0005f0  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
0005f4  e05a              B        |L1.1708|
                  |L1.1526|
;;;179    			}
;;;180    			else
;;;181    			{
;;;182    				lcd_show_string(cmenu->index, cmenu->itemlist[i - 1].item->x, cmenu->itemlist[i -1].item->y, cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->color, cmenu->itemlist[dfnum-1].item->background, *(cmenu->itemlist[i - 1].item->font));
0005f6  1e70              SUBS     r0,r6,#1
0005f8  68e1              LDR      r1,[r4,#0xc]
0005fa  f8510030          LDR      r0,[r1,r0,LSL #3]
0005fe  68c2              LDR      r2,[r0,#0xc]
000600  e9d21000          LDRD     r1,r0,[r2,#0]
000604  6892              LDR      r2,[r2,#8]
000606  e9cd0202          STRD     r0,r2,[sp,#8]
00060a  9101              STR      r1,[sp,#4]
00060c  1e68              SUBS     r0,r5,#1
00060e  68e1              LDR      r1,[r4,#0xc]
000610  f8510030          LDR      r0,[r1,r0,LSL #3]
000614  8940              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0xa]
000616  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000618  1e68              SUBS     r0,r5,#1
00061a  f8d4c00c          LDR      r12,[r4,#0xc]
00061e  f85c0030          LDR      r0,[r12,r0,LSL #3]
000622  8903              LDRH     r3,[r0,#8]
000624  1e70              SUBS     r0,r6,#1
000626  f85c0030          LDR      r0,[r12,r0,LSL #3]
00062a  88c2              LDRH     r2,[r0,#6]

00062e  f85c0030          LDR      r0,[r12,r0,LSL #3]
000632  e000              B        |L1.1590|
                  |L1.1588|
000634  e042              B        |L1.1724|
                  |L1.1590|
000636  8881              LDRH     r1,[r0,#4]
000638  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00063a  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
;;;183    				lcd_show_string(cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->character, cmenu->itemlist[i - 1].item->x + cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->font->size, cmenu->itemlist[i - 1].item->y, cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->color, cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->background, *(cmenu->itemlist[i - 1].item->font));
00063e  1e70              SUBS     r0,r6,#1
000640  68e1              LDR      r1,[r4,#0xc]
000642  f8510030          LDR      r0,[r1,r0,LSL #3]
000646  68c2              LDR      r2,[r0,#0xc]
000648  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
00064a  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
00064c  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
00064e  1e68              SUBS     r0,r5,#1
000650  68e1              LDR      r1,[r4,#0xc]
000652  f8510030          LDR      r0,[r1,r0,LSL #3]
000656  8940              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0xa]
000658  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00065a  f1a60c01          SUB      r12,r6,#1
00065e  f8d4800c          LDR      r8,[r4,#0xc]
000662  f858c03c          LDR      r12,[r8,r12,LSL #3]
000666  f8bc8004          LDRH     r8,[r12,#4]
00066a  f1a50c01          SUB      r12,r5,#1
00066e  f8d4900c          LDR      r9,[r4,#0xc]
000672  f859c03c          LDR      r12,[r9,r12,LSL #3]
000676  f8dcc00c          LDR      r12,[r12,#0xc]
00067a  f89cc000          LDRB     r12,[r12,#0]
00067e  44c4              ADD      r12,r12,r8
000680  fa1ff18c          UXTH     r1,r12
000684  f1a50c01          SUB      r12,r5,#1
000688  f859c03c          LDR      r12,[r9,r12,LSL #3]
00068c  f8bc3008          LDRH     r3,[r12,#8]
000690  f1a60c01          SUB      r12,r6,#1
000694  f859c03c          LDR      r12,[r9,r12,LSL #3]
000698  f8bc2006          LDRH     r2,[r12,#6]
00069c  f1a50c01          SUB      r12,r5,#1
0006a0  f859c03c          LDR      r12,[r9,r12,LSL #3]
0006a4  f8dc0000          LDR      r0,[r12,#0]
0006a8  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
                  |L1.1708|
;;;184    			}
;;;185    			dfnum--;
0006ac  1e68              SUBS     r0,r5,#1
0006ae  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
0006b0  1e70              SUBS     r0,r6,#1              ;164
0006b2  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0                 ;164
                  |L1.1716|
0006b4  2e00              CMP      r6,#0                 ;164
0006b6  f47faf4c          BNE      |L1.1362|
;;;186    		}
;;;187    	}
0006ba  e0b3              B        |L1.2084|
                  |L1.1724|
;;;188    	else//需要滚动
;;;189    	{
;;;190    		uint8_t i, k;
;;;191    		dfnum = cmenu->selectitem -1;
0006bc  7c20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0x10]
0006be  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0006c0  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
;;;192    		
;;;193    		for(i = 0, k = cmenu->sizePer - 1; i < cmenu->sizePer; i++)//滚动刷新（每一项都需要刷新）
0006c2  2700              MOVS     r7,#0
0006c4  7920              LDRB     r0,[r4,#4]
0006c6  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0006c8  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
0006ca  e0a3              B        |L1.2068|
                  |L1.1740|
;;;194    		{
;;;195    			cmenu->index[0] = dfnum + '0';
0006cc  f1050030          ADD      r0,r5,#0x30
0006d0  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;196    			if(cmenu->index[0] > '9')
0006d2  7820              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0]
0006d4  2839              CMP      r0,#0x39
0006d6  dd02              BLE      |L1.1758|
;;;197    				cmenu->index[0] = cmenu->index[i]-'9'+'A'-1;
0006d8  5de0              LDRB     r0,[r4,r7]
0006da  1dc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#7
0006dc  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
                  |L1.1758|
;;;198    			
;;;199    			if(i == 0)
0006de  bbef              CBNZ     r7,|L1.1884|
;;;200    			{			
;;;201    				/*
;;;202    				高亮显示
;;;203    				*/
;;;204    				//显示下标
;;;205    				//显示菜单第一项
;;;206    				lcd_show_string(cmenu->index, cmenu->itemlist[k].item->x, cmenu->itemlist[k].item->y, cmenu->forceground, cmenu->background, *(cmenu->itemlist[k].item->font));
0006e0  68e0              LDR      r0,[r4,#0xc]
0006e2  f8500036          LDR      r0,[r0,r6,LSL #3]
0006e6  68c2              LDR      r2,[r0,#0xc]
0006e8  e9d21000          LDRD     r1,r0,[r2,#0]
0006ec  6892              LDR      r2,[r2,#8]
0006ee  e9cd0202          STRD     r0,r2,[sp,#8]
0006f2  9101              STR      r1,[sp,#4]
0006f4  8aa0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x14]
0006f6  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0006f8  68e0              LDR      r0,[r4,#0xc]
0006fa  f8500036          LDR      r0,[r0,r6,LSL #3]
0006fe  88c2              LDRH     r2,[r0,#6]
000700  68e0              LDR      r0,[r4,#0xc]
000702  f8500036          LDR      r0,[r0,r6,LSL #3]
000706  8881              LDRH     r1,[r0,#4]
000708  8a63              LDRH     r3,[r4,#0x12]
00070a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00070c  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
;;;207    				lcd_show_string(cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->character, cmenu->itemlist[k].item->x + cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->font->size, cmenu->itemlist[k].item->y, cmenu->forceground, cmenu->background, *(cmenu->itemlist[k].item->font));
000710  68e0              LDR      r0,[r4,#0xc]
000712  f8500036          LDR      r0,[r0,r6,LSL #3]
000716  68c2              LDR      r2,[r0,#0xc]
000718  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
00071a  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
00071c  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
00071e  8aa0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x14]
000720  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000722  f8d4c00c          LDR      r12,[r4,#0xc]
000726  f85cc036          LDR      r12,[r12,r6,LSL #3]
00072a  f8bc8004          LDRH     r8,[r12,#4]
00072e  f1a50c01          SUB      r12,r5,#1
000732  f8d4900c          LDR      r9,[r4,#0xc]
000736  f859c03c          LDR      r12,[r9,r12,LSL #3]
00073a  f8dcc00c          LDR      r12,[r12,#0xc]
00073e  f89cc000          LDRB     r12,[r12,#0]
000742  44c4              ADD      r12,r12,r8
000744  fa1ff18c          UXTH     r1,r12
000748  f859c036          LDR      r12,[r9,r6,LSL #3]
00074c  f8bc2006          LDRH     r2,[r12,#6]
000750  f1a50c01          SUB      r12,r5,#1
000754  f859c03c          LDR      r12,[r9,r12,LSL #3]
000758  8a63              LDRH     r3,[r4,#0x12]
00075a  e000              B        |L1.1886|
                  |L1.1884|
00075c  e004              B        |L1.1896|
                  |L1.1886|
00075e  f8dc0000          LDR      r0,[r12,#0]
000762  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
000766  e04f              B        |L1.2056|
                  |L1.1896|
;;;208    			}
;;;209    			else
;;;210    			{
;;;211    				lcd_show_string(cmenu->index, cmenu->itemlist[k].item->x, cmenu->itemlist[k].item->y, cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->color, cmenu->itemlist[dfnum-1].item->background, *(cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->font));
000768  1e68              SUBS     r0,r5,#1
00076a  68e1              LDR      r1,[r4,#0xc]
00076c  f8510030          LDR      r0,[r1,r0,LSL #3]
000770  68c2              LDR      r2,[r0,#0xc]
000772  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
000774  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
000776  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
000778  1e68              SUBS     r0,r5,#1
00077a  68e1              LDR      r1,[r4,#0xc]
00077c  f8510030          LDR      r0,[r1,r0,LSL #3]
000780  8940              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0xa]
000782  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000784  1e68              SUBS     r0,r5,#1
000786  f8d4c00c          LDR      r12,[r4,#0xc]
00078a  f85c0030          LDR      r0,[r12,r0,LSL #3]
00078e  8903              LDRH     r3,[r0,#8]
000790  f85c0036          LDR      r0,[r12,r6,LSL #3]

00079c  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00079e  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
;;;212    				lcd_show_string(cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->character, cmenu->itemlist[k].item->x + cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->font->size, cmenu->itemlist[k].item->y, cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->color, cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->background, *(cmenu->itemlist[dfnum -1].item->font));
0007a2  1e68              SUBS     r0,r5,#1
0007a4  68e1              LDR      r1,[r4,#0xc]
0007a6  f8510030          LDR      r0,[r1,r0,LSL #3]
0007aa  68c2              LDR      r2,[r0,#0xc]
0007ac  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
0007ae  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
0007b0  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
0007b2  1e68              SUBS     r0,r5,#1
0007b4  68e1              LDR      r1,[r4,#0xc]
0007b6  f8510030          LDR      r0,[r1,r0,LSL #3]
0007ba  8940              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0xa]
0007bc  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0007be  f8d4c00c          LDR      r12,[r4,#0xc]
0007c2  f85cc036          LDR      r12,[r12,r6,LSL #3]
0007c6  f8bc8004          LDRH     r8,[r12,#4]
0007ca  f1a50c01          SUB      r12,r5,#1
0007ce  f8d4900c          LDR      r9,[r4,#0xc]
0007d2  f859c03c          LDR      r12,[r9,r12,LSL #3]
0007d6  f8dcc00c          LDR      r12,[r12,#0xc]
0007da  f89cc000          LDRB     r12,[r12,#0]
0007de  44c4              ADD      r12,r12,r8
0007e0  fa1ff18c          UXTH     r1,r12
0007e4  f1a50c01          SUB      r12,r5,#1
0007e8  f859c03c          LDR      r12,[r9,r12,LSL #3]
0007ec  f8bc3008          LDRH     r3,[r12,#8]
0007f0  f859c036          LDR      r12,[r9,r6,LSL #3]
0007f4  f8bc2006          LDRH     r2,[r12,#6]
0007f8  f1a50c01          SUB      r12,r5,#1
0007fc  f859c03c          LDR      r12,[r9,r12,LSL #3]
000800  f8dc0000          LDR      r0,[r12,#0]
000804  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
                  |L1.2056|
;;;213    			}
;;;214    			dfnum--;
000808  1e68              SUBS     r0,r5,#1
00080a  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
;;;215    			k --;
00080c  1e70              SUBS     r0,r6,#1
00080e  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
000810  1c78              ADDS     r0,r7,#1              ;193
000812  b2c7              UXTB     r7,r0                 ;193
                  |L1.2068|
000814  7920              LDRB     r0,[r4,#4]            ;193
000816  42b8              CMP      r0,r7                 ;193
000818  f73faf58          BGT      |L1.1740|
;;;216    		}
;;;217    		cmenu->selectitem --;
00081c  7c20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0x10]
00081e  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000820  7420              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x10]
;;;218    	}
000822  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.2084|
;;;219    } 
000824  e8bd87ff          POP      {r0-r10,pc}
;;;220    
                          ENDP

                  intermenuitem PROC
;;;221    
;;;222    void intermenuitem(uint8_t num,menu* cmenu)
000828  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;223    {
00082a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00082c  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;224    	num--;
00082e  1e60              SUBS     r0,r4,#1
000830  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
;;;225    	if(num<cmenu->height && cmenu->itemlist[num].status_id!= NULL)
000832  78e8              LDRB     r0,[r5,#3]
000834  42a0              CMP      r0,r4
000836  dd0a              BLE      |L1.2126|
000838  68e8              LDR      r0,[r5,#0xc]
00083a  eb0000c4          ADD      r0,r0,r4,LSL #3
00083e  7900              LDRB     r0,[r0,#4]
000840  b128              CBZ      r0,|L1.2126|
;;;226    		Load_status(cmenu->itemlist[num].status_id);
000842  68e9              LDR      r1,[r5,#0xc]
000844  eb0101c4          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #3
000848  7908              LDRB     r0,[r1,#4]
00084a  f7fffffe          BL       Load_status
                  |L1.2126|
;;;227    }
00084e  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;228    
                          ENDP

                  LoadTextBox PROC
;;;230    
;;;231    void LoadTextBox(textbox * boxxxxx)
000850  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;232    {
000852  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;233    	lcd_clear();
000854  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_clear
;;;234    	boxxxxx->selectitem=0;
000858  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00085a  7220              STRB     r0,[r4,#8]
;;;235    	boxxxxx->itemlist[0]();
00085c  6861              LDR      r1,[r4,#4]
00085e  6808              LDR      r0,[r1,#0]
000860  4780              BLX      r0
;;;236    }
000862  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;237    
                          ENDP

                  TextBoxNAVDOWN PROC
;;;238    
;;;239    void TextBoxNAVDOWN(textbox * boxxxxx)
000864  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;240    {
000866  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;241    	if(boxxxxx->height>1)
000868  7820              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0]
00086a  2801              CMP      r0,#1
00086c  dd0e              BLE      |L1.2188|
;;;242    	{
;;;243    	    lcd_clear();
00086e  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_clear
;;;244    		boxxxxx->selectitem=(boxxxxx->selectitem+1)%(boxxxxx->height);
000872  7a20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#8]
000874  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
000876  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]
000878  fb90f2f1          SDIV     r2,r0,r1
00087c  fb010012          MLS      r0,r1,r2,r0
000880  7220              STRB     r0,[r4,#8]
;;;245    		
;;;246    			boxxxxx->itemlist[boxxxxx->selectitem]();
000882  7a22              LDRB     r2,[r4,#8]
000884  6861              LDR      r1,[r4,#4]
000886  f8510022          LDR      r0,[r1,r2,LSL #2]
00088a  4780              BLX      r0
                  |L1.2188|
;;;247    		//if(boxxxxx->selectitem != boxxxxx->height-1)
;;;248    			//Display("↓",6,14,0);	
;;;249    		
;;;250    	}
;;;251    }
00088c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;252    
                          ENDP

                  TextBoxDISBYID PROC
;;;253    void TextBoxDISBYID(textbox *boxxxxx,uint8_t i)
00088e  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;254    {
000890  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000892  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;255    	if(i<boxxxxx->height)
000894  7820              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0]
000896  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
000898  dd07              BLE      |L1.2218|
;;;256    	{
;;;257    	lcd_clear();
00089a  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_clear
;;;258    	boxxxxx->selectitem=i;
00089e  7225              STRB     r5,[r4,#8]
;;;259    	boxxxxx->itemlist[boxxxxx->selectitem]();
0008a0  7a22              LDRB     r2,[r4,#8]
0008a2  6861              LDR      r1,[r4,#4]
0008a4  f8510022          LDR      r0,[r1,r2,LSL #2]
0008a8  4780              BLX      r0
                  |L1.2218|
;;;260    	}
;;;261    }
0008aa  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;262    
                          ENDP

                  contant_load PROC
;;;272    */
;;;273    void contant_load(HOLDER* holder)
0008ac  e92d41ff          PUSH     {r0-r8,lr}
;;;274    {
0008b0  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;275    	uint8_t i=0;
0008b2  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
;;;276    	
;;;277    //	if(EX_SIZE < 800)
;;;278    //	show_string(holder->title, (g_lcd.xSize - sizeof(holder->title)/2),  0); //显示容器名字（在没有侧边栏的时候需要）
;;;279    	
;;;280    	
;;;281    	lcd_show_string(holder->contentList[i].item->character, holder->contentList[i].item->x, holder->contentList[i].item->y,  holder->zicolor, holder->background, *(holder->contentList[i].item->font) );//打印选择项的内容名字
0008b4  ebc501c5          RSB      r1,r5,r5,LSL #3
0008b8  68a0              LDR      r0,[r4,#8]
0008ba  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2
0008be  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]
0008c0  68c1              LDR      r1,[r0,#0xc]
0008c2  e9d10200          LDRD     r0,r2,[r1,#0]
0008c6  6889              LDR      r1,[r1,#8]
0008c8  e9cd2102          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#8]
0008cc  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
0008ce  8a60              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x12]
0008d0  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0008d2  ebc507c5          RSB      r7,r5,r5,LSL #3
0008d6  68a6              LDR      r6,[r4,#8]
0008d8  eb060687          ADD      r6,r6,r7,LSL #2
0008dc  69b6              LDR      r6,[r6,#0x18]
0008de  88f2              LDRH     r2,[r6,#6]
0008e0  ebc507c5          RSB      r7,r5,r5,LSL #3
0008e4  68a6              LDR      r6,[r4,#8]
0008e6  eb060687          ADD      r6,r6,r7,LSL #2
0008ea  69b6              LDR      r6,[r6,#0x18]
0008ec  88b1              LDRH     r1,[r6,#4]

0008f2  68a6              LDR      r6,[r4,#8]

0008f8  69b6              LDR      r6,[r6,#0x18]
0008fa  89e3              LDRH     r3,[r4,#0xe]
0008fc  6830              LDR      r0,[r6,#0]
0008fe  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string

000902  ebc501c5          RSB      r1,r5,r5,LSL #3
000906  68a0              LDR      r0,[r4,#8]
000908  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2
00090c  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]

000916  8a60              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x12]
000918  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]

00091e  68a6              LDR      r6,[r4,#8]

00092c  eb060687          ADD      r6,r6,r7,LSL #2

                  |L1.2378|

00094e  68a0              LDR      r0,[r4,#8]
000950  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2
000954  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]

000992  ebc501c5          RSB      r1,r5,r5,LSL #3
000996  68a0              LDR      r0,[r4,#8]
000998  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2

                  |L1.2522|

0009de  dd02              BLE      |L1.2534|

0009e2  42a8              CMP      r0,r5                 ;286
0009e4  dcb1              BGT      |L1.2378|
                  |L1.2534|
;;;291    	}

0009e8  7320              STRB     r0,[r4,#0xc]
;;;293    }
0009ea  e8bd81ff          POP      {r0-r8,pc}
;;;294    
                          ENDP

                  content_page_down PROC
;;;298    */
;;;299    void content_page_down(HOLDER* holder)
0009ee  e92d41ff          PUSH     {r0-r8,lr}
;;;300    {
0009f2  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;301    	uint8_t cur,i=0;
0009f4  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
;;;302    	if(holder->curSelectId % holder->shownumPage !=0 && holder->curSelectId < holder->size)//当前选择在同一页内

0009f8  7b61              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0xd]
0009fa  fb90f2f1          SDIV     r2,r0,r1
0009fe  fb010012          MLS      r0,r1,r2,r0
000a02  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000a04  d07e              BEQ      |L1.2820|
000a06  7b20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0xc]
000a08  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]
000a0a  4288              CMP      r0,r1
000a0c  da7a              BGE      |L1.2820|
;;;303    	{
;;;304    		cur = holder->curSelectId - 1;
000a0e  7b20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0xc]
000a10  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000a12  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
;;;305    		//先刷屏再显示
;;;306    		lcd_show_string("                          ",  holder->contentList[cur].item->x  ,holder->contentList[cur].item->y, holder->foreground, holder->background, *(holder->font));//显示内容
000a14  69a2              LDR      r2,[r4,#0x18]
000a16  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
000a18  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
000a1a  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
000a1c  8a60              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x12]
000a1e  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000a20  ebc507c5          RSB      r7,r5,r5,LSL #3
000a24  68a0              LDR      r0,[r4,#8]
000a26  eb000087          ADD      r0,r0,r7,LSL #2
000a2a  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]
000a2c  88c2              LDRH     r2,[r0,#6]

000a32  68a0              LDR      r0,[r4,#8]
000a34  eb000087          ADD      r0,r0,r7,LSL #2
000a38  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]
000a3a  8881              LDRH     r1,[r0,#4]
000a3c  8aa3              LDRH     r3,[r4,#0x14]
000a3e  a0fe              ADR      r0,|L1.3640|
000a40  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string

000a44  69a2              LDR      r2,[r4,#0x18]
000a46  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}

000a82  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}

000a86  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}

000a96  88fa              LDRH     r2,[r7,#6]

;;;310    		
;;;311    		cur = holder->curSelectId - 1;

000ac4  69a2              LDR      r2,[r4,#0x18]
000ac6  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}

000aca  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
000acc  8a60              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x12]
000ace  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000ad0  ebc50cc5          RSB      r12,r5,r5,LSL #3
000ad4  68a7              LDR      r7,[r4,#8]

000ada  69bf              LDR      r7,[r7,#0x18]
000adc  88fa              LDRH     r2,[r7,#6]

000ae8  69bf              LDR      r7,[r7,#0x18]
000aea  88b9              LDRH     r1,[r7,#4]

000af0  68a7              LDR      r7,[r4,#8]

000b00  69a2              LDR      r2,[r4,#0x18]
000b02  e000              B        |L1.2822|
                  |L1.2820|
000b04  e01b              B        |L1.2878|
                  |L1.2822|
000b06  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
000b08  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
000b0a  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
000b0c  8a60              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x12]

                  |L1.2878|

;;;317    	if(holder->curSelectId == holder->size)//因为是从1开始角标，所以最后项角标正好等于容器大小

000b42  4288              CMP      r0,r1
000b44  d0fa              BEQ      |L1.2876|

;;;319    		//如果到了最后一项，则什么都不做
;;;320    
;;;321    	}
;;;322    	else//超出了屏幕,重新显示一页
;;;323    	{
;;;324    		//if(holder->curSelectId < holder->size)

000b48  e019              B        |L1.2942|
                  |L1.2890|
;;;328    			{
;;;329    				lcd_show_string("                            ",  holder->contentList[cur].item->x  ,holder->contentList[cur].item->y, holder->foreground, holder->background,  *(holder->font));//清屏

000b4c  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
000b4e  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
000b50  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}

000b54  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]

000b5c  eb000087          ADD      r0,r0,r7,LSL #2

000b68  68a0              LDR      r0,[r4,#8]
000b6a  eb000087          ADD      r0,r0,r7,LSL #2
000b6e  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]

000b74  a0b7              ADR      r0,|L1.3668|
000b76  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
000b7a  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;327
000b7c  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;327
                  |L1.2942|
000b7e  7b60              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0xd]          ;327
000b80  42a8              CMP      r0,r5                 ;327
000b82  dd02              BLE      |L1.2954|
000b84  7820              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0]            ;327
000b86  42a8              CMP      r0,r5                 ;327
000b88  dcdf              BGT      |L1.2890|
                  |L1.2954|
;;;330    			}
;;;331    			
;;;332    			//前面for循环已将+1了
;;;333    			cur = holder->curSelectId;
000b8a  7b25              LDRB     r5,[r4,#0xc]
;;;334    			
;;;335    			lcd_show_string(holder->contentList[cur].item->character, holder->contentList[cur].item->x,  holder->contentList[cur].item->y, holder->zicolor, holder->background, *(holder->font));//打印选择项的内容名字

000b8e  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}

000b92  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}

                  |L1.3222|
;;;350    		}
;;;351    	}
;;;352    } 
000c96  e8bd81ff          POP      {r0-r8,pc}
;;;353

                  content_page_up PROC
;;;357    */
;;;358    void content_page_up(HOLDER* holder)
000c9a  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;359    {
000c9e  b08c              SUB      sp,sp,#0x30
000ca0  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;360    	int cur,i;
;;;361    	
;;;362    	if(holder->curSelectId > 1 && ((holder->curSelectId - 1) % holder->shownumPage != 0))//非每页第一项

000ca4  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000ca6  dd7c              BLE      |L1.3490|

;;;365    		cur = holder->curSelectId - 1;

000ed2  8aa3              LDRH     r3,[r4,#0x14]
000ed4  a804              ADD      r0,sp,#0x10
000ed6  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
;;;394    			
;;;395    			len = strlen(holder->contentList[cur+i].val);
000eda  19aa              ADDS     r2,r5,r6
000edc  ebc202c2          RSB      r2,r2,r2,LSL #3
000ee0  68a1              LDR      r1,[r4,#8]
000ee2  eb010182          ADD      r1,r1,r2,LSL #2
000ee6  f1010008          ADD      r0,r1,#8
000eea  f7fffffe          BL       strlen
000eee  4680              MOV      r8,r0
;;;396    			for(j = 0; j < (len+1); j++)//这里计算了itemname 和 val中间的空格
000ef0  2700              MOVS     r7,#0
000ef2  e003              B        |L1.3836|
                  |L1.3828|
;;;397    			tmp[j] = ' ';
000ef4  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
000ef6  a904              ADD      r1,sp,#0x10
000ef8  55c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r7]
000efa  1c7f              ADDS     r7,r7,#1              ;396
                  |L1.3836|
000efc  f1080001          ADD      r0,r8,#1              ;396
000f00  4287              CMP      r7,r0                 ;396
000f02  d3f7              BCC      |L1.3828|
;;;398    			tmp[j] = '\0';
000f04  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000f06  a904              ADD      r1,sp,#0x10
000f08  55c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r7]
;;;399    			lcd_show_string(tmp,  holder->contentList[cur+i].valueX  ,holder->contentList[cur+i].valueY, holder->foreground, holder->background, *(holder->font));//刷屏，给上一屏幕空出空间
000f0a  69a2              LDR      r2,[r4,#0x18]
000f0c  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
000f0e  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
000f10  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
000f12  8a60              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x12]
000f14  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000f16  eb050c06          ADD      r12,r5,r6
000f1a  ebcc0ccc          RSB      r12,r12,r12,LSL #3
000f1e  68a0              LDR      r0,[r4,#8]
000f20  eb00008c          ADD      r0,r0,r12,LSL #2
000f24  88c2              LDRH     r2,[r0,#6]
000f26  eb050c06          ADD      r12,r5,r6
000f2a  ebcc0ccc          RSB      r12,r12,r12,LSL #3
000f2e  68a0              LDR      r0,[r4,#8]
000f30  eb00008c          ADD      r0,r0,r12,LSL #2
000f34  8881              LDRH     r1,[r0,#4]
000f36  8aa3              LDRH     r3,[r4,#0x14]
000f38  a804              ADD      r0,sp,#0x10
000f3a  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
000f3e  1c76              ADDS     r6,r6,#1              ;385
                  |L1.3904|
000f40  7b60              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0xd]          ;385
000f42  42b0              CMP      r0,r6                 ;385
000f44  dd04              BLE      |L1.3920|
000f46  19a8              ADDS     r0,r5,r6              ;385
000f48  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;385
000f4a  4288              CMP      r0,r1                 ;385
000f4c  f6ffaf56          BLT      |L1.3580|
                  |L1.3920|
;;;400    		}
;;;401    		
;;;402    		
;;;403    		
;;;404    		(holder->curSelectId)--;
000f50  7b20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0xc]
000f52  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000f54  7320              STRB     r0,[r4,#0xc]
;;;405    		
;;;406    		cur = holder->curSelectId - 1;
000f56  7b20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0xc]
000f58  1e45              SUBS     r5,r0,#1
;;;407    		lcd_show_string(holder->contentList[cur].item->character, holder->contentList[cur].item->x,  holder->contentList[cur].item->y, holder->zicolor, holder->background, *(holder->font));//打印选择项的内容名字
000f5a  69a2              LDR      r2,[r4,#0x18]
000f5c  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
000f5e  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
000f60  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
000f62  8a60              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x12]
000f64  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000f66  ebc50cc5          RSB      r12,r5,r5,LSL #3
000f6a  68a7              LDR      r7,[r4,#8]
000f6c  eb07078c          ADD      r7,r7,r12,LSL #2
000f70  69bf              LDR      r7,[r7,#0x18]
000f72  88fa              LDRH     r2,[r7,#6]
000f74  ebc50cc5          RSB      r12,r5,r5,LSL #3
000f78  68a7              LDR      r7,[r4,#8]

000f7e  69bf              LDR      r7,[r7,#0x18]
000f80  88b9              LDRH     r1,[r7,#4]
000f82  ebc50cc5          RSB      r12,r5,r5,LSL #3
000f86  68a7              LDR      r7,[r4,#8]

000f8c  69bf              LDR      r7,[r7,#0x18]

000f90  6838              LDR      r0,[r7,#0]
000f92  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
;;;408    		lcd_show_string(holder->contentList[cur].val, holder->contentList[cur].valueX, holder->contentList[cur].valueY, holder->numcolor, holder->background, *(holder->font));
000f96  69a2              LDR      r2,[r4,#0x18]
000f98  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
000f9a  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
000f9c  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
000f9e  8a60              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x12]
000fa0  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000fa2  ebc50cc5          RSB      r12,r5,r5,LSL #3

000fa8  eb07078c          ADD      r7,r7,r12,LSL #2
000fac  88fa              LDRH     r2,[r7,#6]

                  |L1.4052|
;;;413    //		while(i < holder->shownumPage - 1 &&  cur >=0)这里会死机
;;;414    		{
;;;415    			lcd_show_string(holder->contentList[cur].item->character,  holder->contentList[cur].item->x  ,holder->contentList[cur].item->y, holder->foreground, holder->background, *(holder->font));//显示内容
000fd4  69a2              LDR      r2,[r4,#0x18]
000fd6  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}

000fda  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}

000fe4  68a7              LDR      r7,[r4,#8]
000fe6  eb07078c          ADD      r7,r7,r12,LSL #2
000fea  69bf              LDR      r7,[r7,#0x18]
000fec  88fa              LDRH     r2,[r7,#6]

001006  69bf              LDR      r7,[r7,#0x18]

00100a  6838              LDR      r0,[r7,#0]

001010  69a2              LDR      r2,[r4,#0x18]
001012  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
001014  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
001016  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}

00101a  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]

001020  68a7              LDR      r7,[r4,#8]
001022  eb07078c          ADD      r7,r7,r12,LSL #2
001026  88fa              LDRH     r2,[r7,#6]
001028  ebc50cc5          RSB      r12,r5,r5,LSL #3

00103a  eb07078c          ADD      r7,r7,r12,LSL #2
00103e  f1070008          ADD      r0,r7,#8
001042  8aa3              LDRH     r3,[r4,#0x14]
001044  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string

;;;418    			i++;

                  |L1.4172|

001050  dd01              BLE      |L1.4182|
001052  2d00              CMP      r5,#0                 ;412
001054  dabe              BGE      |L1.4052|
                  |L1.4182|
;;;419    		}
;;;420    	}
;;;421    } 
001056  b00c              ADD      sp,sp,#0x30
001058  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;422    
                          ENDP

                  content_item_fls PROC
;;;425    */
;;;426    void content_item_fls(HOLDER* holder)
00105c  b57f              PUSH     {r0-r6,lr}
;;;427    {
00105e  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;428    	lcd_show_string("                ", 								holder->contentList[holder->curSelectId - 1].valueX, holder->contentList[holder->curSelectId - 1].valueY, holder->foreground, holder->background,  *(holder->font)); //打印内容对应值
001060  69a2              LDR      r2,[r4,#0x18]
001062  e9d21000          LDRD     r1,r0,[r2,#0]
001066  6892              LDR      r2,[r2,#8]
001068  e9cd0202          STRD     r0,r2,[sp,#8]
00106c  9101              STR      r1,[sp,#4]
00106e  8a60              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x12]
001070  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
001072  7b20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0xc]
001074  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
001076  ebc000c0          RSB      r0,r0,r0,LSL #3
00107a  68a5              LDR      r5,[r4,#8]
00107c  eb050080          ADD      r0,r5,r0,LSL #2
001080  88c2              LDRH     r2,[r0,#6]
001082  7b20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0xc]

00108a  eb050080          ADD      r0,r5,r0,LSL #2

001092  f2af2034          ADR      r0,|L1.3680|
001096  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
;;;429    	lcd_show_string(holder->contentList[holder->curSelectId - 1].val,	holder->contentList[holder->curSelectId - 1].valueX, holder->contentList[holder->curSelectId - 1].valueY, holder->numcolor , holder->background,  *(holder->font)); //打印内容对应值
00109a  69a2              LDR      r2,[r4,#0x18]
00109c  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
00109e  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
0010a0  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
0010a2  8a60              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x12]
0010a4  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0010a6  7b25              LDRB     r5,[r4,#0xc]

0010aa  ebc505c5          RSB      r5,r5,r5,LSL #3

0010d0  f1050008          ADD      r0,r5,#8
0010d4  8a23              LDRH     r3,[r4,#0x10]
0010d6  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_string
;;;430    }
0010da  bd7f              POP      {r0-r6,pc}
;;;431    
                          ENDP

                  transfer_value_to_char PROC
;;;434    */
;;;435    void transfer_value_to_char(uint32_t val, char *addr)
0010dc  b57f              PUSH     {r0-r6,lr}
;;;436    {
0010de  4605              MOV      r5,r0
0010e0  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;437    	uint8_t len;
;;;438    	char tmp[13];
;;;439    	len = sprintf(tmp, "%u", val);
0010e2  462a              MOV      r2,r5
0010e4  a162              ADR      r1,|L1.4720|
0010e6  4668              MOV      r0,sp
0010e8  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
0010ec  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
;;;440    	addr[len] = 0;
0010ee  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0010f0  55a0              STRB     r0,[r4,r6]
;;;441    	memcpy(addr, tmp, len); 
0010f2  4632              MOV      r2,r6
0010f4  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0010f6  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0010f8  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memcpy
;;;442    }
0010fc  bd7f              POP      {r0-r6,pc}
;;;443    
                          ENDP

                  transfer_value_to_time PROC
;;;448    */
;;;449    void transfer_value_to_time(uint32_t val, char *addr)
0010fe  b57c              PUSH     {r2-r6,lr}
;;;450    {
001100  4604              MOV      r4,r0
001102  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;451    	char tmp[6];
;;;452    	tmp[5] = 0;
001104  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
001106  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]
;;;453    	sprintf(tmp, "%04u", val);
00110a  4622              MOV      r2,r4
00110c  a159              ADR      r1,|L1.4724|
00110e  4668              MOV      r0,sp
001110  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
;;;454    	tmp[4] = tmp[3]; 
001114  f89d0003          LDRB     r0,[sp,#3]
001118  f88d0004          STRB     r0,[sp,#4]
;;;455    	tmp[3] = tmp[2];
00111c  f89d0002          LDRB     r0,[sp,#2]
001120  f88d0003          STRB     r0,[sp,#3]
;;;456    	tmp[2] = ':';
001124  203a              MOVS     r0,#0x3a
001126  f88d0002          STRB     r0,[sp,#2]
;;;457    	strcpy(addr, tmp);
00112a  4669              MOV      r1,sp
00112c  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00112e  f7fffffe          BL       strcpy
;;;458    }
001132  bd7c              POP      {r2-r6,pc}
;;;459    
                          ENDP

                  transfer_value_to_data PROC
;;;463    */
;;;464    void transfer_value_to_data(uint32_t val, char *addr)
001134  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;465    {
001138  4605              MOV      r5,r0
00113a  460f              MOV      r7,r1
;;;466    	char tmp[11], len, i;
;;;467    	tmp[10] = 0;
00113c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00113e  f88d000a          STRB     r0,[sp,#0xa]
;;;468    	i = len = sprintf(tmp, "%04u", val/10000);
001142  f2427010          MOV      r0,#0x2710
001146  fbb5f8f0          UDIV     r8,r5,r0
00114a  4642              MOV      r2,r8
00114c  a149              ADR      r1,|L1.4724|
00114e  4668              MOV      r0,sp
001150  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
001154  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001156  4606              MOV      r6,r0
001158  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;469    	tmp[i++] = '/';
00115a  212f              MOVS     r1,#0x2f
00115c  4626              MOV      r6,r4
00115e  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
001160  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
001162  f80d1006          STRB     r1,[sp,r6]
;;;470    	len = sprintf(&tmp[i], "%02u", val%10000/100);
001166  f2427010          MOV      r0,#0x2710
00116a  fbb5f1f0          UDIV     r1,r5,r0
00116e  fb005011          MLS      r0,r0,r1,r5
001172  2164              MOVS     r1,#0x64
001174  fbb0f8f1          UDIV     r8,r0,r1
001178  eb0d0004          ADD      r0,sp,r4
00117c  4642              MOV      r2,r8
00117e  a13f              ADR      r1,|L1.4732|
001180  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
001184  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
;;;471    	i += len;
001186  19a0              ADDS     r0,r4,r6
001188  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
;;;472    	tmp[i++] = '/';
00118a  222f              MOVS     r2,#0x2f
00118c  4621              MOV      r1,r4
00118e  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
001190  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
001192  f80d2001          STRB     r2,[sp,r1]
;;;473    	len = sprintf(&tmp[i], "%02u", val%10000%100);
001196  f2427010          MOV      r0,#0x2710
00119a  fbb5f1f0          UDIV     r1,r5,r0
00119e  fb005011          MLS      r0,r0,r1,r5
0011a2  2164              MOVS     r1,#0x64
0011a4  fbb0f2f1          UDIV     r2,r0,r1
0011a8  fb010812          MLS      r8,r1,r2,r0
0011ac  eb0d0004          ADD      r0,sp,r4
0011b0  4642              MOV      r2,r8
0011b2  a132              ADR      r1,|L1.4732|
0011b4  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
0011b8  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
;;;474    	i += len;
0011ba  19a0              ADDS     r0,r4,r6
0011bc  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
;;;475    	tmp[i++] = '/';
0011be  222f              MOVS     r2,#0x2f
0011c0  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0011c2  1c61              ADDS     r1,r4,#1
0011c4  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
0011c6  f80d2000          STRB     r2,[sp,r0]
;;;476    	strcpy(addr, tmp);
0011ca  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0011cc  4638              MOV      r0,r7
0011ce  f7fffffe          BL       strcpy
;;;477    }
0011d2  e8bd83fe          POP      {r1-r9,pc}
;;;478    
                          ENDP

                  transfer_value_to_money PROC
;;;481    */
;;;482    void transfer_value_to_money(uint32_t val, char *addr)
0011d6  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;483    {
0011da  4607              MOV      r7,r0
0011dc  4688              MOV      r8,r1
;;;484    	char *format = addr;
0011de  4646              MOV      r6,r8
;;;485    	uint8_t len,i;
;;;486    	
;;;487    	len = sprintf(format,"%u",val);
0011e0  463a              MOV      r2,r7
0011e2  a123              ADR      r1,|L1.4720|
0011e4  4630              MOV      r0,r6
0011e6  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
0011ea  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
;;;488    
;;;489    	if(g_vm.point != 0)
0011ec  4825              LDR      r0,|L1.4740|
0011ee  78c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#3]  ; g_vm
0011f0  2800              CMP      r0,#0
0011f2  d038              BEQ      |L1.4710|
;;;490    	{
;;;491    		if(len <= g_vm.point)//不够个位的前面补零
0011f4  4823              LDR      r0,|L1.4740|
0011f6  78c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#3]  ; g_vm
0011f8  42a0              CMP      r0,r4
0011fa  db1a              BLT      |L1.4658|
;;;492    		{
;;;493    			for(i = 0; i < len; i++)//首先移位
0011fc  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
0011fe  e00a              B        |L1.4630|
                  |L1.4608|
;;;494    			{
;;;495    				format[len + g_vm.point - len - i] = format[len - 1 - i ]; 
001200  1e60              SUBS     r0,r4,#1
001202  1b40              SUBS     r0,r0,r5
001204  5c30              LDRB     r0,[r6,r0]
001206  491f              LDR      r1,|L1.4740|
001208  78c9              LDRB     r1,[r1,#3]  ; g_vm
00120a  4421              ADD      r1,r1,r4
00120c  1b09              SUBS     r1,r1,r4
00120e  1b49              SUBS     r1,r1,r5
001210  5470              STRB     r0,[r6,r1]
001212  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;493
001214  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;493
                  |L1.4630|
001216  42a5              CMP      r5,r4                 ;493
001218  dbf2              BLT      |L1.4608|
;;;496    			}
;;;497    			for(i = 0; i < (g_vm.point - len + 1); i++)//补零
00121a  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
00121c  e003              B        |L1.4646|
                  |L1.4638|
;;;498    			{
;;;499    				format[i] = '0';
00121e  2030              MOVS     r0,#0x30
001220  5570              STRB     r0,[r6,r5]
001222  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;497
001224  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;497
                  |L1.4646|
001226  4817              LDR      r0,|L1.4740|
001228  78c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#3]            ;497  ; g_vm
00122a  1b00              SUBS     r0,r0,r4              ;497
00122c  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;497
00122e  42a8              CMP      r0,r5                 ;497
001230  dcf5              BGT      |L1.4638|
                  |L1.4658|
;;;500    			}
;;;501    		}
;;;502    		if(len <= g_vm.point)//补零后长度变化
001232  4814              LDR      r0,|L1.4740|
001234  78c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#3]  ; g_vm
001236  42a0              CMP      r0,r4
001238  db01              BLT      |L1.4670|
;;;503    			len = len + i;
00123a  1960              ADDS     r0,r4,r5
00123c  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
                  |L1.4670|
;;;504    		
;;;505    		//每个数字只需要移动1位
;;;506    		for(i = 0; i < (g_vm.point); i++)//小数点是几位数则需要移动几位数字
00123e  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
001240  e006              B        |L1.4688|
                  |L1.4674|
;;;507    		{
;;;508    			format[len - i] = format[len - 1 - i ];//小数点后面的部分移后一位
001242  1e60              SUBS     r0,r4,#1
001244  1b40              SUBS     r0,r0,r5
001246  5c30              LDRB     r0,[r6,r0]
001248  1b61              SUBS     r1,r4,r5
00124a  5470              STRB     r0,[r6,r1]
00124c  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;506
00124e  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;506
                  |L1.4688|
001250  480c              LDR      r0,|L1.4740|
001252  78c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#3]            ;506  ; g_vm
001254  42a8              CMP      r0,r5                 ;506
001256  dcf4              BGT      |L1.4674|
;;;509    		}
;;;510    		
;;;511    		format[len - g_vm.point] = '.';
001258  202e              MOVS     r0,#0x2e
00125a  490a              LDR      r1,|L1.4740|
00125c  78c9              LDRB     r1,[r1,#3]  ; g_vm
00125e  1a61              SUBS     r1,r4,r1
001260  5470              STRB     r0,[r6,r1]
;;;512    		len ++;
001262  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
001264  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
                  |L1.4710|
;;;513    	}
;;;514    	format[len]='\0';
001266  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
001268  5530              STRB     r0,[r6,r4]
;;;515    }
00126a  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
                          ENDP

00126e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.4720|
001270  257500            DCB      "%u",0
001273  00                DCB      0
                  |L1.4724|
001274  25303475          DCB      "%04u",0
001278  00      
001279  00                DCB      0
00127a  00                DCB      0
00127b  00                DCB      0
                  |L1.4732|
00127c  25303275          DCB      "%02u",0
001280  00      
001281  00                DCB      0
001282  00                DCB      0
001283  00                DCB      0
                  |L1.4740|
                          DCD      g_vm

                          AREA ||.bss||, DATA, NOINIT, ALIGN=2

                  mytextboxxxxx
                          %        12
                  mymenu
                          %        24
                  holder
                          %        28
